channel.title: Sailing on AC's Blog (formerly known as Choicy White Boy)
channel.description: Recent content in Sailing on AC's Blog (formerly known as Choicy White Boy)

item.title: Books and boats
item.author: choicywhiteboy@accapehart.com (AC Capehart)
item.description: I guess this really has been a bay area weekend. Yesterday, we went down to Berkeley partly just to wander, partly to pick up a kid-sized table and chairs for Sam that Carolyn arranged to buy through BPN but partly to go to Half Price Books. We were seeking the third book in the Song of Fire and Ice series — A Storm of Swords. I gave up on the series after the first book — too much soap opera, too little fantasy, but it engulfed Carolyn like a raging storm (of swords?
